DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis one follow condition base upon World Health Organization ( WHO ) diagnostic criterion : aggressive systemic mastocytosis ( ASM ) , systemic mastocytosis associate clonal hematologic nonmast cell lineage disease ( SMAHNMD ) , mast cell leukemia ( MCL ) , smolder systemic mastocytosis ( SSM ) , indolent systemic mastocytosis ( ISM ) Diagnosis confirm bone marrow biopsy Fluency English Willingness ability participate onehour interview A condition situation would interfere participation interview ( e.g. , cognitive impairment disorder , alcohol drug abuse ) Known human immunodeficiency virus acquire immunodeficiency syndromerelated illness Any prior malignancy except follow : Adequately treat basal cell squamous cell skin cancer ; In situ cervical cancer ; Adequately treat Stage I II cancer subject currently complete remission , cancer subject diseasefree 2 year
